name: Blocks Hexa Fruit
description:
Just tap and move blocks to fill up the square and collect block pieces to level up. Easy to play and pleasure gam for all ages.

FEATURES
- Addictive gameplay
- Quick & Easy to Learn
- Enjoy game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
- Smooth gameplay
- No Time Limit
- It is all FREE and No Wi-Fi Need!
